text: @SenSchumer TEST ALL NOW! Until we can get mass testing (to include retesting) & contact tracing conducted we'll be chasing a COVID-19 tail. We still don't have good data. Died in their homes untested? Died in hospitals untested?? Homeless dying untested? Non-symptomatic (carriers) untested?
